name: comic-vine-sdk
description: A JS/TS client for the Comic Vine API

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run test && npm run package
scripts.compile: tsc --project tsconfig.build.esm.json && ts-node ./scripts/create-package-json.ts --moduleType="esm" --packageJsonType=module && tsc --project tsconfig.build.cjs.json && ts-node ./scripts/create-package-json.ts --moduleType="cjs" --packageJsonType=commonjs
scripts.upgrade: pnpm update npm-check-updates && npm-check-updates --upgrade --target=minor --peer --dep=dev,peer,prod,optional --filter=@ally-murray/projen-modules,@types/node,@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin,@typescript-eslint/parser,commander,commitizen,eslint-config-prettier,eslint-import-resolver-node,eslint-import-resolver-typescript,eslint-plugin-import,eslint-plugin-prettier,eslint,husky,lint-staged,nock,npm-check-updates,prettier,projen,rimraf,standard-version,ts-node,typescript,vitest,axios,zod && pnpm i --no-frozen-lockfile && pnpm update @ally-murray/projen-modules @types/node @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser commander commitizen eslint-config-prettier eslint-import-resolver-node eslint-import-resolver-typescript eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-prettier eslint husky lint-staged nock npm-check-updates prettier projen rimraf standard-version ts-node typescript vitest axios zod && npm run post-upgrade
